TopicTitle: KRAVITY- KSP Movie and other stuff

Articles.Content:
I thought I present my Cinematics (and other stuff;)) here. On my Channel you'll find mainly Cinematics (Movies).

"KRAVITY" KSP Movie:

My Kravity is based on the Movie Gravity, you now it, don't you? Anyway, actually I'm completely reworking it and translate it to english, the Kravity on my Channel is German (I'm from Germany). I hope I can upload the (New) Trailer in the next week, if you want a trailer...?

Anyway, I`ve got a question:

Do you want a short Movie with the Main Story or a longer Movie (20-30minutes maybe) with more impressive pictures and a more detailed story?

Please tell me about your opinion, I can change all now!

And excuse me for my grammar if i make too many mistakes..xD

Die_Kartoffel

Edited March 2, 2014 by Die_Kartoffel
I've got another question: KSP is sometimes a bit laggy, does it change anything if I decrease the size of the textures of Universe Replacer/ BoulderCo?
I think if you dont use mods it would be more symbolical.
Dinamic warp mod, it helps with the laggy when you shot it at low speed and acelerate in the edition.

Dinamic warp mod, it helps with the laggy when you shot it at low speed and acelerate in the edition.

Except the new TimeControl replacement is, at least for me, completely broken. It says may break ships. Read: ALWAYS. I have yet to not blow anything up with it.
Okay, MAYBE I'll test that Mod, but CAREFULLY.
Aand hello guys! As I promised, here's the Trailer for my KRAVITY Movie! Enjoy! Aaaand tell me what do you think about it ;)Music is: Heart of courage- Two Steps from hell
